title: What face is this? anyone?
content:
Anyone know this type?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090326045841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/isd_6303.jpg)

| [isd.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090326045841/http:/typophile.com/files/isd.jpg) | 70.49 KB |

 [‹ TYPE ID PLEASE?](http://web.archive.org/web/20090326045841/http:/typophile.com/node/56068 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type id please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090326045841/http:/typophile.com/node/56062 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SF

comments.content: Possibly hand drawn, but here are some [typefaces in that style](http://web.archive.org/web/20090326045841/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/elegant_vintage_caps_of_the_20s/&sample_text=TR%C3%89VA&sample_size=74), Carlton being the closest match.

That’s pretty close Stephen thank you! That will work!

best  
sf
